ISSUE.TITLE: Customize attachment name of Invoice
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 **Steps to reproduce the problem:** Set `ordersettings.attachpdfinvoicetoorderplacedemail` to `true` Enable Email sending Create an Order You will receive an Email with the Order placed notification. You will have attached a document called `order.pdf` **The problem:** The name is not customizable and cannot be translated into other languages. **What I would expect:** I would expect a similar field to `OrderNumberMask` where we can customize the attachment name

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5913 Added some more decimal values of Prices, Totals, Discounts etc.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5138 Added possibility to customize attachment name of Invoice
